name: BALIN
description:
EASY TO PLAY, EASY TO FAIL!!! 

Many make the mistake of believing that BALIN is an easy, slow game with nothing to offer. But I can assure you that very few can finish it at the first attempt, much less get the maximum score.

Do you think you can be the one who masters BALIN?

BALIN is a minigame of skill and patience where you must avoid falling off the platform.
